lines.text:
[after being handed a parachute]
How do I get into it?
You oughta know. You make 'em for the government.

[At the airport]
Where'd the Falcon get that other dame?
Sometimes I think he takes 'em outta his hat!
Why are you suddenly so interested in me?
Beautiful and mysterious women always interest me.

[Referring to his fiancee's missing industrialist father]
Why, the old man and I are like thar.
I'm in his corner. We're pals!

[Sarcastically]
Handy things, rich fathers. All the best families have them.
